text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Fund shall pay to a fund producer of a policyholder to whom a policy is issued a commission:
for private passenger auto insurance issued by the Fund, at a rate determined by the Fund but not less than 10% and not to exceed 15% of the total premium; and
for any other insurance issued by the Fund, at a rate determined by the Fund but not to exceed 10% of the total premium.

The Fund may not pay a commission:
on a fully earned basis;
if a prospective insured fails to qualify under § 20-502 of this subtitle; or
if a prospective insured's initial payment to the Fund, a fund producer, or premium finance company is not honored.
If a policy issued by the Fund is canceled, the Fund shall refund any unearned commissions.
